scripts.build-noclean:
node_modules/.bin/antora antora-playbook.yml --stacktrace --fetch;echo '
#legacy cms to current' >> ./build/site/.htaccess;cat dot-htaccess-current >> ./build/site/.htaccess;echo '

#legacy to git cms legacy site' >> ./build/site/.htaccess;cat dot-htaccess-legacy >> ./build/site/.htaccess;cat dot-htaccess-static >> ./build/site/.htaccess
